name: BinaryWorld
description:
BinaryWorld is..

Move With the arrow keys / w, a, s, d / a Joystick controller.

Attack with Space / B button.

quit the game at any time with esc / Back Button.

A single-Player game with 2 characters to control on the screen.

the player controls both the characters at the same time which requires him to split attention to different parts of the maze.

The goal of the player is to attack or avoid getting hit by the enemies and reach the Coin at the end of the maze with the two characters at the same moment.

Final thoughts: This is my first Game Jam and I am Only One Programmer, all the assets here were Royalty free and the Game Was Influenced by old NES Game Named Binary land.
